 You have an interesting site there, Salvi, wish you had the english versio=
n for we uni language old folks. sf

 



-----Original Message-----
From: =
Salvi <digitpower101@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tue,=
 Jul 27, 2010 3:12 pm
Subject: AW: [EVP-ITC] Re: Science vs. Ghost Box Tech=
nology

          =C2=A0                                     
sorry ursula =
for interfering, but i dont think, this is the  right way for discussing wi=
th matt.=C2=A0a bit more decency is  desiderable.
 matt has done very inter=
esting considerations and i agree with his opinion.  
 =C2=A0
 i think, we =
need in our research more details and these  important details can give us =
maybe
 scientist with scientific investigations. telling that  scientists a=
re "stupid,stepdorks,  "non-belivers",etc
 is=C2=A0not fair.
 =C2=A0
   sor=
ry for my bad english, but i have reading for a long  time here in the list=
, and now i though, it=C2=A0was
 the moment to write my 2  cents.
 =C2=A0

=
 for information: my name is salvi, ham operator since  1990 with call HB9G=
BY, i am living in bern,  switzerland,=C2=A0
 builder of the experimental-u=
nits named  ghost-station. i have a homepage www.transkommunikation.ch ,  
=
 not completly finished yet and at the  moment=C2=A0only in german  languag=
e.

 =C2=A0
 best regards
 =C2=A0
 salvi

   Von: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com  =
[mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] Im Auftrag von Ursula  Kalin
Gesendet: Die=
nstag, 27. Juli 2010 19:35
An:  EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Betreff: Re: [EVP-I=
TC] Re: Science vs. Ghost  Box Technology


 
=C2=A0    
 you sound insane
=

 
   From: Matt  <elvymir@...>
To:  EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Se=
nt: Sun, July 25, 2010 11:16:52  PM
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re:  Science vs. Gho=
st Box Technology

=C2=A0   

Well Id first wish to introduce myself. My na=
me is Matt Dowdell and  im from a small group of people who have been doing=
 paranormal  research/investigation in the CT area. This is my first post, =
but i have  been lurking threw these forums for some time.

One thing i wou=
ld like  everyone who reads this realize is that paranormal research/invest=
igating,  like any new science, nothing can be written in stone.

Now i do =
want to  say that the research into the boxes and other devices by Frank an=
d others can  not go unnoticed, but there is still one or two flaws in them=
.

I mean,  with the short bit i listened to, i dont feel as if they are ba=
shing you or  frank personally but the idea behind the boxes, but without a=
 doubt in a  ignorant fashion.

Regardless, i personally try to stay away f=
rom the  boxes, but i join this site inorder to learn more about them and h=
ow they work.  To me the boxes have to much "chance" to may be or may not b=
e something. I have  used one in the past and had an interesting result, bu=
t for all i know, it could  have been a rogue radio wave from a station in =
the area. Im just hoping to give  you an idea of this thinking is VS bashin=
g your ideas and work, which im simpley  not. Science is about proving some=
thing from every angle and being without a  doubt its correct without anyon=
e able to say its something  else.

Unfortunetly, with the boxes, there is =
alot of noise and when  matrixing comes into mind, you create a situation w=
here something is absolutly  nothing, seems to be otherwise. Im not saying =
they dont work, from it, again im  saying it could be a "chance".

Video, p=
ictures are fool proof, audio  really isnt, and honestly, when my team pick=
s up EVPs we go into them with a  doubtful mind and dont depend on them to =
be our  evidence.






 

 
      
                 
   
       
  


----------MB_8CCFBD9ACC66642_F9C_3933_webmail-m003.sysops.aol.com

Well Id=
 first wish to introduce myself. My name is Matt Dowdell and  im from a sma=
ll group of people who have been doing paranormal  research/investigat<wbr>=
ion in the CT area. This is my first post, but i have  been lurking threw t=
hese forums for some time.<br>
<br>
One thing i would like  everyone who re=
ads this realize is that paranormal research/investigat<wbr>ing,  like any =
new science, nothing can be written in stone.<br>
<br>
Now i do want to  sa=
y that the research into the boxes and other devices by Frank and others ca=
n  not go unnoticed, but there is still one or two flaws in them.<br>
<br>
=
I mean,  with the short bit i listened to, i dont feel as if they are bashi=
ng you or  frank personally but the idea behind the boxes, but without a do=
ubt in a  ignorant fashion.<br>
<br>
Regardless, i personally try to stay a=
way from the  boxes, but i join this site inorder to learn more about them =
and how they work.  To me the boxes have to much "chance" to may be or may =
not be something. I have  used one in the past and had an interesting resul=
t, but for all i know, it could  have been a rogue radio wave from a statio=
n in the area. Im just hoping to give  you an idea of this thinking is VS b=
ashing your ideas and work, which im simpley  not. Science is about proving=
 something from every angle and being without a  doubt its correct without =
anyone able to say its something  else.<br>
<br>
Unfortunetly, with the box=
es, there is alot of noise and when  matrixing comes into mind, you create =
a situation where something is absolutly  nothing, seems to be otherwise. I=
m not saying they dont work, from it, again im  saying it could be a "chanc=
e".<br>
<br>
Video, pictures are fool proof, audio  really isnt, and honest=
ly, when my team picks up EVPs we go into them with a  doubtful mind and do=
nt depend on them to be our  evidence.<br>
<br>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>=
